name: RANGE 2.14 CORP.
sampleDescriptions: Obtaining Visas and approvals for evacuees from Afghanistan
Identifying individuals needing evacuation from Afghanistan and obtaining visas.
Assisting Veterans of Afghan War Operations in obtaining visas for Afghans they served with.
Identification of Afghans in need of evacuation and Refugee Status following the U.S. withdrawal from Afghanistan.
Identification of Afghans in need of Refugee Status.
